core_constraints.name: bidirectional_connectivity
core_constraints.description: Two cities u and v are connected if a package can be delivered from u to v and from v to u through a sequence of couriers meeting in shared cities at compatible times.

core_constraints.name: time_synchronized_handoff
core_constraints.description: Packages can only be transferred between couriers who are present in the same city at the same time according to the fixed daily schedule (assumed based on problem narrative).

objective.description: After each courier is hired, count the number of unordered pairs (u, v) with u < v such that cities u and v are connected.

invariant.name: union_find_connectivity
invariant.description: Connectivity evolves monotonically as edges (courier routes) are added; strongly connected components merge over time and never split.
